body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         Take a bike ride along Cane River. NPS Photo  Currently there are no fees to visit Oakland or Magnolia Plantations.  The America the Beautiful Pass Program is not available at the park; this includes the Golden Age Pass as well.
title: Cane River Creole National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
